sentences: He has designed album covers for artists including Cat Power, Clean Bandit, Deerhunter, Future Islands, Little Dragon, The Maccabees, Paolo Nutini, Lee Ranaldo, Ratking, and Vampire Weekend.
Lionel Skerratt, who co-founded Public Information Records, and Orlando Weeks, lead singer of The Maccabees, are childhood friends of de Jong's.
His cover of the Future Islands album Singles was #3 in the Best Art Vinyl 2014 awards.
He was nominated for a 2018 Grammy Award for his work on Mura Masa's self-titled debut album.
